com.almasb.fxgl.effect

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.effect.Particle

  • public class Particle
extends Object
    Simple particle represented by a circle or an image.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)
